synopsis.text: Astrology student Kocho Enoki is Heian University's unlikely heroine as she combats malevolent spirits with a unique blend of magical abilities and alluring charm. Alongside her captivating younger sister Koran and their human decoy, Kosaku, Kocho strives to liberate the campus from supernatural turmoil. However, the team encounters an unexpected challenge when a powerful female spirit emerges, proving to be resistant to Kocho's enchanting tactics. Will the Astrology club succeed in their mission to protect the university, or will they be left in the spirit world's wicked clutches? Join Kocho and her team in a thrilling adventure that balances the supernatural with the sensual.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
